hero.title: Hi, I'm Tokpa Noël Doré
hero.summary: I am a full-stack developer passionate about building innovative digital solutions. Skilled in web and mobile development, I transform ideas into functional, user-friendly applications. My goal is to contribute to impactful projects while continuously learning and advancing in the tech industry.
about.title: About Me
about.skills.tech.title: Technical Skills
about.skills.tech.content: Technical support, hardware/software troubleshooting, operating system management, user assistance, server setup and maintenance, network administration, software installation/configuration, incident management, customer service.
about.skills.soft.title: Interpersonal Skills
about.skills.soft.content: Strong communication, problem-solving, teamwork, adaptability, time management, patience, customer-focused mindset, attention to detail.
about.skills.others.title: Additional Skills
about.skills.others.content: Programming knowledge (Python, TypeScript, JavaScript, C, C++, Java) with frameworks (Django, React, React Native). Familiar with SQL databases, cybersecurity concepts, and quick to learn new technologies.
about.education.title: Education
about.education.institution: Gamal Abdel Nasser University, Conakry, Guinea
about.education.status: Not completed due to career change
about.education.institution2: Centre de Formation Professionnelle des Carrefours, Montreal, Canada
about.experience.description1: Software installation/configuration, hardware/software troubleshooting, user support, and network maintenance.
projects.title: Projects
projects.project1.title: Warehouse Point of Sale System
projects.project1.description: A POS system designed to streamline retail operations with inventory management and sales tracking.
projects.project2.title: Personal Portfolio
projects.project2.description: A personal website showcasing my skills, projects, and professional experience.
projects.project3.title: Custom Windows Image Deployment
projects.project3.description: Automating the creation and deployment of custom Windows images for fast, consistent installations across multiple machines.
services.title: Services
services.ItSupport.title: IT Support
services.ItSupport.installationDesc: Workstation setup (Windows, Linux, macOS), software installation, printers, peripherals, and network configuration.
services.ItSupport.troubleshootingDesc: Diagnosing and resolving hardware/software issues, system optimization, and data recovery (disks, USB drives, VMs, etc.).
services.ItSupport.securityDesc: Installing antivirus, firewalls, monitoring tools; securing systems and networks (passwords, BIOS, permissions); digital hygiene and best practices training.
services.numericWeb.title: Digital & Web Solutions
services.numericWeb.webDevDesc: Custom websites (showcase, e-commerce, blogs) tailored to your goals and audience.
services.numericWeb.marketingDesc: SEO optimization, social media management, and online ad campaigns to boost visibility and attract clients.
services.numericWeb.maintenanceDesc: Regular updates, backups, security monitoring, and technical assistance to keep your site running smoothly.
services.specializedNiche.title: Specialized Services
services.specializedNiche.sensibilisatio: Workshops and training to educate employees on cyber threats and security best practices.
services.specializedNiche.modularITDesc: Automation scripts (batch, PowerShell, Python); virtual machine setup (Proxmox, Hyper-V, VirtualBox); local server configuration (Windows Server, Linux), with cloud solutions coming soon.
contact.title: Contact Me
contact.description: I’m always open to new projects, opportunities, or collaborations. Reach out via social media or email.
